Description: SCHECTER HELLRAISER SPECIAL Electric Guitar An excellent Schecter Hellraiser Special Electric Guitar!!! It has a beautiful quilt burst finish, set-neck construction, a 24 fret fully bound Rosewood fretboard with Perloid Dagger inlays, Smoked Chrome hardware, and it has 2 active EMG pickups that sound great! It is 24.75 scale, the neck width at the nut is 1 & 5/8", and it weighs 9.4 pounds. The condition is very good(an 8.3 out of 10) with light normal signs of use but shows no fret wear, the guitar is really nice all around with no problems except for alot of light playing scratches on the bottom edge, and 2 stress finish cracks where the fretboard ends at the first couple frets(See pics). Serial#W11121070, made in South Korea in 2011, includes the MeanStreet guitars gig bag case. New list price was $869 USA Shipping, handling, and insurance charge will be $50 in USPS's deliverable USA 48 states. International shipment and handling is $150 for most other countries via USPS's deliverable Priority Mail International delivery plus you may have to pay import taxes/duties to import and it may take 45 days or longer to receive(Only the smaller less populated countries will take that long, not the mainstream well populated countries). The shipping and handling charge will be $100 for Canada delivery. I reserve all rights. Here is a list the countries that I can and will ship to without any problems for the stated fixed shipping prices: Austria, Belgium, Canada, China(Express), Czech Republic, Denmark, England, Finland, France, Germany, Great Britain and Northern Ireland, Greece, Hong Kong, Ireland, Japan, South Korea(Express), Netherlands, New Zealand, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Russia Federation(Express), South Korea(Express), Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom, Vatican City I always declare and insure for the full purchase price, no exceptions. Check out my other auctions as I usually have guitars and parts for sale. I buy and sell quality musical instruments and have over 7000 positive Ebay feedbacks so bid with confidence that you will receive quality merchandise as described, shipped promptly and securely. I also have been playing lead guitar since 1979. I try to describe the condition of the guitars I sell the best I can using the Bluebook of Electric Guitars photo grading system and the shipping rates stated above are a flat fixed rate and covers the shipping, handling, and insurance. Colorado sales must add 4.6% sales tax. No trades. Please... Only bid if you have all the money NOW, and will send me the payment if you are the winning bidder. I sometimes miss a day checking my email so please be patient and I will try to respond to all questions ASAP. Thanks, and good luck bidding.
Title: SCHECTER HELLRAISER SPECIAL Electric Guitar
